GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
intel_th: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 859342220accd0d332864fafbf4e3d2d0492bc3f, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 7b7036d47c356a40818e516a69ac81a5dcc1613f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: intel_th: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path
